stx.ds.plus.Equal

type
class
...

Static Methods

getEqualFor<T>(t : T) : stx.EqualFunction<T>

Returns an EqualFunction (T -> T -> Bool). It works for any type. Custom Classes can provide an "equals(other : T) : Bool" method or a "compare(other : T) : Int" method otherwise simple comparison operators will be used.

getEqualForType<T>(v : ValueType) : stx.EqualFunction<T>
